page.title: 15Leven Community Centre
page.content: David Reid has been Community worker in the Leven centre since 1974. Throughout Mr Reid's time the centre has changed from only a youth centre to a centre for all_pre school to old age pensioners.All interests are catered for_drama,keep fit, whist,Judo disco dancing,badminton and all kinds of sport. A speech therapist comes to help those who have suffered a stroke. They make good progress in the relaxed atmosphere.There is a training centre for the mentally handicapped. The minibus is an asset,used to take the boys'and girls'clubs outings to the swimming pool,horse riding,theatre and camps.It also takes meals to the old and handicapped.The drivers work voluntarily. There is little vandalism,sometimes grafitti on the walls but it is always removed immediately.
